bug.short_desc: cacti package is missing requires php-gd php-posix
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: cacti package is missing requires php-gd and php-posix so the first time we run the installation, it fails the Required PHP Module Support validation.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
How reproducible: always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. update to latest cacti package and try to access your previously installed cacti installation 2. 3.
Actual results: fails validation
Expected results: succeeds
Additional info: this should be handled by the rpm spec file.
